content: (cc @Alex Crichton) does anybody know how to configure/make rustbuild to build all the tarballs that are also uplaoded to static.rlo?
namely, if I just x.py dist, I get rustc-... and rust-std-..., but not e.g. the combined rust-....
Okay, so Iâ€™ve figured out that you cannot just change your config.toml and expect stuff to do what you want :slight_smile:
not a new thing, but definitely annoying
/me is wrestling clippy compile bugs atm
@nagisa I forget exactly how it's all produced but it's all codified in src/ci/docker/dist-* configuration files
Yeah I finally managed to make x.py spit out me a tarball and it is different than what CI spits out :frown:
